testcase.name: One Way Flight Search with Depart Date as current Date
testcase.system-out: Given User on Spicejet landing page.........................................passed When User selects "oneway" radio button option..............................passed And User selects From city as "DEL" and To city as "HYD"....................passed And User selects Depart date as current date................................passed And user select number of Passengers "1"....................................passed And user selects currency "GBP".............................................passed And User clicks on Search button............................................passed Then the page which asks for GST details should display.....................passed

testcase.name: One Way Flight Search with Depart Date as current Date 2
testcase.system-out: Given User on Spicejet landing page.........................................passed When User selects "twoway" radio button option..............................passed And User selects From city as "HYD" and To city as "DEL"....................passed And User selects Depart date as current date................................passed And user select number of Passengers "2"....................................passed And user selects currency "GBP".............................................passed And User clicks on Search button............................................passed Then the page which asks for GST details should display.....................passed
